channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump: If Cracker Barrel Wants To Survive, It Should Admit Rebrand Was A Total Loser
item.description: The Americana culture and decor that defined Cracker Barrel for decades were put at risk with a woke revamp that could cost it customers.
